unnormalised: Arrey yaar, corporate law is such a headache! My friend's company got a notice for not complying with Sec 134 of the Companies Act. Turns out, they didn't file their financial statements properly by the deadline, which was 30/09/2023. Now they're running around trying to get Adv. Sharma to sort it out, warna hefty fines, bhai! It's all so complicated, na?
normalised: Arrey yaar, corporate law is such a headache! My friend's company got a notice for not complying with section one hundred and thirty four of the Companies Act. Turns out, they didn't file their financial statements properly by the deadline, which was thirtieth september two thousand and twenty three. Now they're running around trying to get Advocate Sharma to sort it out, warna hefty fines, bhai! It's all so complicated, na?
